mapper.insert: insert into cafeinfo(cafeid, pwd, cafename, insta, addr, photopath, certifypath, rdate, phone, delete_yn ) values (#{cafeid}, #{pwd}, #{cafename}, #{insta}, #{addr}, #{photopath}, #{certifypath}, sysdate, #{phone}, 'N' )
mapper.select: select cafeid, cafename, addr, insta, phone from cafeinfo where cafeid = #{cafeid} and pwd = #{pwd} and delete_yn='N' and state='Y'
SELECT cafeid, pwd, cafename, addr, insta, phone from cafeinfo where cafeid = #{cafeid} and delete_yn='N' and state='Y'
mapper.update: update cafeinfo set pwd=#{changepwd}, cafename=#{cafename}, insta=#{insta}, phone=#{phone} where cafeid=#{cafeid} and delete_yn='N' and state='Y'
mapper.select: select count(*) from cafeinfo where cafeid=#{cafeid}

select count(*) from cafeinfo where addr=#{addr}
